contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 5, 1882 D Huddersfield Belle Vue Gardens Contest
Huddersfield Belle Vue Gardens Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
huddersfield-belle-vue-gardens-contest
None
Belle Vue Gardens, Sheepridge, Huddersfield Open to any band not having taken a prize over £15 during 1881-1882. 1st annual contest. 7 bands competed.
Dec. 19, 2011, 1:04 p.m. May 3, 2019, 9:12 a.m.
1 Holme Mills Unknown Recollections of Meyerbeer [unknown arranger]
2 Cleckheaton Victoria Unknown Tannhäuser [unknown arranger]
3 Lindley Band Unknown Emira
4 Wyke Old Unknown Emira
Unknown Result Morley Borough Unknown Semiramide [unknown arranger]
Unknown Result Berry Brow Unknown Stiffelio [unknown arranger]
Unknown Result Huddersfield Fire Brigade Unknown Honoria
